page.title: 02Winchhill Farm
page.content: Mr. Sharp is a dairy farmer.He has 250 cows.He lives at Winchhill Farm.He has some chickens,a dog and 2 cats. Mr. Sharp milks the cows twice a day.They stand in the same place in the milking parlour every time.He has places for 10 cows to be milked at once.The milk is collected in a tanker and taken to Wallace Brothers Dairy in Hitchin. In the summer the cows stay in the fields,but in the winter they stay in the barn.The cows make many tons of manure a year.He sells it to people in Breachwood Green.My dad had half a cart full and he put it on the soft fruit and roses to make them grow better. Simon Thurlby.
